trans-unit.source: A list of relative file or folder paths to exclude from formatting.
trans-unit.target: A list of relative file or folder paths to exclude from formatting.

trans-unit.source: A list of relative file or folder paths to include in formatting. All files are formatted if empty.
trans-unit.target: A list of relative file or folder paths to include in formatting. All files are formatted if empty.

trans-unit.source: Accepts a file path, which if provided, will produce a json report in the given directory.
trans-unit.target: Accepts a file path, which if provided, will produce a json report in the given directory.

trans-unit.source: Both a MSBuild project file and solution file found in '{0}'. Specify which to use with the --workspace option.
trans-unit.target: Un fichier projet et un fichier solution MSBuild ont été trouvés dans '{0}'. Spécifiez celui à utiliser avec l'option --workspace.

trans-unit.source: Cannot specify both folder and workspace options.
trans-unit.target: Cannot specify both folder and workspace options.

trans-unit.source: Complete in {0}ms.
trans-unit.target: Complete in {0}ms.

trans-unit.source: Could not find a MSBuild project file or solution file in '{0}'. Specify which to use with the --workspace option.
trans-unit.target: Fichier projet ou solution MSBuild introuvable dans '{0}'. Spécifiez celui à utiliser avec l'option --workspace.

trans-unit.source: Could not format '{0}'. Format currently supports only C# and Visual Basic projects.
trans-unit.target: Impossible de mettre en forme '{0}'. L'opération Mettre en forme prend uniquement en charge les projets C# et Visual Basic pour le moment.

trans-unit.source: Determining formattable files.
trans-unit.target: Determining formattable files.

trans-unit.source: Failed to save formatting changes.
trans-unit.target: L'enregistrement des changements de mise en forme a échoué.

trans-unit.source: Fix end of line marker.
trans-unit.target: Fix end of line marker.

trans-unit.source: Fix file encoding.
trans-unit.target: Fix file encoding.

trans-unit.source: Fix final newline.
trans-unit.target: Fix final newline.

trans-unit.source: Fix whitespace formatting.
trans-unit.target: Fix whitespace formatting.

trans-unit.source: Format complete in {0}ms.
trans-unit.target: Format complete in {0}ms.

trans-unit.source: Format files, but do not save changes to disk.
trans-unit.target: Mettez en forme les fichiers, mais n'enregistrez pas les changements sur le disque.

trans-unit.source: Formats files without saving changes to disk. Terminates with a non-zero exit code if any files were formatted.
trans-unit.target: Formats files without saving changes to disk. Terminates with a non-zero exit code if any files were formatted.

trans-unit.source: Formatted {0} of {1} files.
trans-unit.target: Formatted {0} of {1} files.

trans-unit.source: Formatting code file '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: Mise en forme du fichier de code '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: Formatting code files in workspace '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: Mise en forme des fichiers de code dans l'espace de travail '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: Loading workspace.
trans-unit.target: Chargement de l'espace de travail.

trans-unit.source: Multiple MSBuild project files found in '{0}'. Specify which to use with the --workspace option.
trans-unit.target: Plusieurs fichiers projet MSBuild dans '{0}'. Spécifiez celui à utiliser avec l'option --workspace.

trans-unit.source: Multiple MSBuild solution files found in '{0}'. Specify which to use with the --workspace option.
trans-unit.target: Plusieurs fichiers solution MSBuild dans '{0}'. Spécifiez ceux à utiliser avec l'option --workspace.

trans-unit.source: Running formatters.
trans-unit.target: Running formatters.

trans-unit.source: Set the verbosity level. Allowed values are q[uiet], m[inimal], n[ormal], d[etailed], and diag[nostic]
trans-unit.target: Définissez le niveau de détail. Les valeurs autorisées sont q[uiet], m[inimal], n[ormal], d[etailed] et diag[nostic]

trans-unit.source: Skipping referenced project '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: Saut du projet référencé '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: The file '{0}' does not appear to be a valid project or solution file.
trans-unit.target: Le fichier '{0}' ne semble pas être un fichier projet ou solution valide.

trans-unit.source: The folder to operate on. Cannot be used with the `--workspace` option.
trans-unit.target: The folder to operate on. Cannot be used with the `--workspace` option.

trans-unit.source: The project file '{0}' does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Le fichier projet '{0}' n'existe pas.

trans-unit.source: The solution file '{0}' does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Le fichier solution '{0}' n'existe pas.

trans-unit.source: The solution or project file to operate on. If a file is not specified, the command will search the current directory for one.
trans-unit.target: Fichier solution ou projet à utiliser. Si un fichier n'est pas spécifié, la commande en recherche un dans le répertoire actuel.

trans-unit.source: Formatted code file '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: Formatted code file '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: Unable to locate MSBuild. Ensure the .NET SDK was installed with the official installer.
trans-unit.target: Unable to locate MSBuild. Ensure the .NET SDK was installed with the official installer.

trans-unit.source: Using MSBuild.exe located in '{0}'
trans-unit.target: Using MSBuild.exe located in '{0}'

trans-unit.source: Warnings were encountered while loading the workspace. Set the verbosity option to the 'diagnostic' level to log warnings.
trans-unit.target: Warnings were encountered while loading the workspace. Set the verbosity option to the 'diagnostic' level to log warnings.

trans-unit.source: Writing formatting report to: '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: Writing formatting report to: '{0}'.
